content.rendered:
Process: Inbound Blended Process (voice+ Backend)
Hiring for :
AR Trainee – HSC/Graduate Freshers
AR Associate
SR AR (female)
Location – Airoli
Basic computer knowledge.
Education – HSC/Graduate fresher NO Bpharma
Shift Timings- US Shifts
Salary Range :
AR Trainee –
1)10,700k only for 3 months
2) After 3 months 13.5k + 5k Incentives
3) After 6 months 14.5k + 5k Incentives
AR Associate – 15,000 for Non Bpo and 17k for Bpo Experience
SR AR – 25000 In-hand
Experience Slab:
1) AR trainee: freshers
2) AR associate: 1 to 6 months of any experience and Bpo can be consider
3) SR AR: 6 Months of international Bpo experience

Workings days: Monday to Friday with Saturday & Sunday fixed off
(Home drop will be given)

Age – 18 to 40 Years
